arts.ttl: Hoffenheim nearly safe with late equaliser in Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Marius Bülter scored a late equaliser for Hoffenheim in a 2-2 draw in Wolfsburg in the Matchday 33 opener on Friday, a result that virtually assures the visitors of Bundesliga football next season. Hoffenheim's persistence paid off in the 34th minute when Pavel Kadeřábek volleyed home a cross from Marius Bülter to level the scores.

arts.ttl: VfL Wolfsburg vs. TSG Hoffenheim preview: Visitors aim to secure Bundesliga safety
arts.sum: Hoffenheim can secure their Bundesliga status as they travel to Volkswagen Arena to face an out-of-form Wolfsburg side on Friday evening.
